thread.title: TAP launches new Trade website designed specifically to assist UK travel agents
thread.title_full: TAP launches new Trade website designed specifically to assist UK travel agents

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: TAP launches new Trade website designed specifically to assist UK travel agents
text:
TAP launches new Trade website designed specifically to assist UK travel agents TAP launches new Trade website designed specifically to assist UK travel agents Details Category: Airport & Airline   13:30 TAP, the leading airline to Portugal from the UK, announces the launch of a brand new dedicated portal for UK travel agents: www.tapagents.com. With no log-in required, the website means more information is available at agents’ fingertips than ever before, enabling a better service for their clients and an easier booking experience with TAP. 
The “TAP Agents” site is designed to assist agents and travel organisers with extensive information about TAP and its services, along with technical information regarding booking and ticketing procedures. There are four main areas to the site; All About TAP, Services and Information, Procedures & Special Assistance and Book your Group. This platform provides an efficient and time-effective gateway to accessing details required for bookings. Please pay special attention to the Procedures & Special Assistance section where TAP gives updated information regarding chargeable SSR`s (E.g. Excess baggage, musical instruments, etc…) and new policies regarding chargeable special meals. Agents may also subscribe to receive the TAP newsletter that will not only focus on technical information published on the website but also updates on new services as well as the destinations that TAP operates.
